targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area"] =~ /${area:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["geography"] =~ /${geography:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] =~ /${region:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["${unique_identifier}"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["product_full_name"] =~ /${model:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> group(columns: ["${unique_identifier}"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["${unique_identifier}", "firmware_version"])
  |> rename(columns: {
    "${unique_identifier}": "host",
    firmware_version: "firmware version"
  })

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
|> last()

list.description: All devices that are known in the schema
list.label: Device
list.name: device

list.description: The name of the field for the unique identifier like the serial number
list.name: unique_identifier

list.description: UID of the device details dashboard
list.name: device_details_uid
